stamp: U.S. POSTAL CARD ONE CENT 1 JEFFERSON 1
p: Thanks for your letter, Mama. The dress is not only "warm and serviceable" - wait until you see it on me. I wore it to the opera Monday. Albert liked it. We happened to see Mrs. Stoker there and she said it was lovely! Sig can't help it that he has to be on the floor unexpectedly. We practiced awhile yesterday. Last Sunday Albert and I went to the Musical Arts . And I sang for an a man there who is arranging programs. He wants Sig & me to come one eve. this week. It may be nothing, but we'll see.
I am going to sing very soon for Mrs. Stoker.
Will try to come home - I don't know about Sig & Max. If they don't (can't) come, could we bring Millie?
